column4: great, a load of people right lets see if anyone's up to date with this one, very new to linux but i'm ok with computers so just hit me, i'm trying to intall ubuntu on an intel based system but it doesnt seem to like something in my rig , i belive its something to do with the graphics card, symtoms are funny things start to happen at some point during the instalation like the loading bar that goes back and forth well i

get 2 of those and the screen looks a bit like its gone beyond its max resolution then the screen goes black and the comp restarts... any ideas?? i cant be very specific since i dont know how to check the logs last time linux (i belive it was debian) a year or so ago during the instalation process i had a lil log thing going on my screen so i could tell exactly whats going on, with this one its a bit like windows aint g
ot a clue what its doing untill it goes poofff... then all i can tell is that it broke the reason why its why im here to hopefuly find out
